Student_Grading_SchemeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_Grading_SchemeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_Grading_SchemeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to a Grading scheme we're editing

validation.validation: Enter a Student Grading Scheme Name that isn't already in use.
Specify a grade with a unique Reference ID for each snapshot. A grade with the same Reference ID is already in use on another snapshot of the grading scheme.

Student_Grade_ElementObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_Grade_ElementObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Grade_Subedit_Data.description: Whether this Grade is Included in GPA
Whether this Grade can be Repeated for Grade Improvement

Student_Grade_Category_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_Grade_Category_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_Grade_Category_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Grade_Subedit_Data.description: Whether or not this Grade has required Grade Notes
Whether or not this Grade has required Last Date of Attendance
Whether this Grade has Display Grades Notes to Student

validation.validation: Grade Notes Required can only be set if the Grade Category Type is Allow Grade Notes.
Cannot have more than 1 Grade with a Grade Category Type of Lapsed Grade.
Last Date of Attendance Required can only be set if the Grade Category Type is Allow Last Date of Attendance
You can Display Grade Notes to Student only when you set the Grade Category Type to Allow Grade Notes.
Cannot have more than 1 Grade with a Grade Category Type of Lapsed Grade.
